document_data.mainbody:
Lances of burning blackfire were +1 corrosive heavy flaming lances and the preferred weapons of the Griffon Cavalry of Waterdeep. They were made from the wood of a zalantar tree and inscribed with runes of the deity Mystra.
Fashioning one of these weapons required the crafter to utilize one of these spells acid fog, acid storm, Melfs acid arrow, or storm of vengeance and one of the following flame blade, flame strike, or fireball. The cost of materials was typically 9,410 gp, but they sold for almost double the cost.
